title: Top Places to visit in Morigaon, Assam
content: Morigaon district is an administrative district in the state of Assam in India. The district headquarters are located at Morigaon. The district occupies an area of 1,704 km² and has a population of 957,853 (as of 2011) of which males and females are 485,328 and 472,525 respectively. The Tiwa
